title: The Sibylline Oracle
description: Voted Goodreads Best Release of June 2013!"A mix of the easy charm and undying love from Twilight but the intelligence, wit, and mystery of The Da Vinci Code.""I'm hooked!""I have a new favorite author!""Great read!"CAN LOVE DEFY TIME? When she's rescued by handsome Alex Morgan, Valeria thinks she's found her happy ending. But Alex knows the terrifying truth...time is running out! And unless they can discover the source of an ancient curse, fate will take her life...again. Greek Mythology and modern romance intertwine in this addictive trilogy.THE SIBYLLINE TRILOGY - a love more enduring than life...than death...than destiny.
author: Delia J. Colvin
